data.displayName: Sumo Business Standing Offer Single Rate

fees.description: This fee is only applicable for payments made by credit card and debit card.

A standard connection fee of upto $137.17 (ex GST) applies during standard business hours (Monday to Friday, excluding public holidays). If meter access is not available at the time of connection, a site visit fee of $126.29 (ex GST) will apply. All fees are subject to change and may vary depending on your distribution network or specific property requirements. Additional charges may apply for urgent, after-hours, or complex connections.

electricityContract.terms: Offer not available in all areas or properties. You must be a Small Business customer with an applicable network tariff for a premises where Sumo supplies Electricity. Please refer to our website https://www.sumo.com.au/help-and-support/terms-and-conditions/sumo-terms-and-conditions for full terms and conditions.
electricityContract.variation: Prices, fees and charges are subject to change. We will give you at least 5 business days prior notice.

eligibility.description: You must be a small business customer on the applicable network tariff and Sumo is the designated retailer.

solarFeedInTariff.description: If you have installed solar PV at the Premises, you may be eligible to be paid for excess electricity you feed back into the grid.

electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: We will pass through any fee imposed by your distributor, including fees for disconnection or reconnection, or special meter read on move-out.? Distributor fees published at https://www.sumo.com.au/help-and-support/rates-and-other-charges/other-fees-and-charges. Fee applied to your next bill.
